title: Impact of digital payments on monetary policy transmission in India: evidence from the post-demonetization era
description: This study evaluates the impact of digital payments on monetary policy transmission in India post-demonetization. Using the Long Run ARDL Model, ARDL Short-Run Dynamics, and ARDL Error Correction Model, we find a significant negative correlation between digital payments and the Weighted Average Lend...
